pageContext.claim: “In Syria, we've had a tremendous impact. When I went there -- don't forget, when they went to Syria five years ago, they were supposed to be there for three to four months, and they never came out. We are pulling back in Syria. We're going to be removing our troops. I never said we're doing it that quickly.”
pageContext.analysis: There was no end date when President Obama sent the first deployment of 50 special ops forces to Syria in October 2015.
